name: END THE SLEND
description:
"He's threatened our town for years, it's about time we deal with this."

End The Slend is a short first person horror game based on the classic Slenderman creepypasta. Find all of the Runes to complete the ritual and craft a powerful tool to banish the Slenderman once and for all.

Made for a collab game jam, where we had one week to make a Slender-style game.

Controls: WASD to move, Mouse to look around, and Left Click to "interact"...
